title: Pika Labs â€” AI Tool Review
description: Pika is an AI video generation platform that transforms text, images, and existing videos into high-quality, customizable short video clips. Pika Labs is a video AI startup offering a web-based platform for generating and editing videos using AI. It supports text-to-video, image-to-video, video-to-video transformation, and video extension. Pika 1.5 and 2.0 added 'Pikaffects' for unique visual transformations like crushing, exploding, or melting objects in videos, setting it apart from competitors. Highlights: Unique Pikaffects for creative transformations. User-friendly interface. Image and video to video. Fast generation. Active development.
